label: 大内裏
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: This greater imperial palace included the inner palace (dairi) as well as the major ministries of the central government. The palace of Heian-kyō (Kyoto) also included the Shingon'in religious chapel, and had dimensions of 4,573.5 ft. x 3,819 ft.
